description: The configuration for a horizontal Pod autoscaler, which automatically manages the replica count of any resource implementing the `scale` subresource based on the `metrics` specified.

apiVersion.description: The version of the schema for the object representation

kind.description: A string value representing the REST resource

metadata.description: Standard object metadata. The `name` must be a valid DNS subdomain name.

spec.description: Specification of the behavior of the autoscaler

status.description: The current information about the autoscaler.
